Last Load Error: no wpiHaljni in java.library.path: C:\Users????\Desktop\SwerveDrivetrain\build\jni\release A common cause of this error is missing the C++ runtime.

I’ve followed the instruction from Known Issues — FIRST Robotics Competition documentation but it didn’t work

Since you didn’t include the full path, is your Desktop on OneDrive? OneDrive doesn’t play nicely with the build system, so if it is on OneDrive, try moving it somewhere else.

Just fyi- that known issues page you linked is from 2020. The latest version is here:

FIRST Robotics Competition Documentation

Known Issues

This article details known issues (and workarounds) for FRC ® Control System Software. Open Issues: roboRIO 2.0 Ethernet Settings: Issue: On the roboRIO 2.0, the Ethernet port is configured to DHCP...
